data.name: CoH 2 - German Commander: Luftwaffe Supply Doctrine
data.detailed_description:
GERMAN COMMANDER: Luftwaffe Supply Doctrine
Using the power of the Luftwaffe, keep your troops on the front lines as long as possible, even if cut off!

  • Stuka Bombing Strike
    A JU-87D Stuka will dive in and drop a 50kg bomb on the target location. Capture points are neutralized if hit.
  • Incendiary Bombing Run
    A Stuka will drop incendiary bombs on the target location.
  • Reconnaissance Overflight
    Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.
  • Supply Drop Zone
    Cargo planes will fly over a designated Fuel or Muinitions point, dropping off resource crates that can be recovered by infantry.
  • Air-Dropped Medical Supplies
    Paradrop medical supplies at a target area. Heals and inspires nearby units when picked up.

  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)

Minimum Requirements

  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
